13. Write the names of the components of the biosphere to which the indicated lists of objects belong.

a) Basalt, granite  
b) Bacteria, plants, animals, fungi  
c) Soil, silt  
d) Coal, peat, chalk, oxygen, carbon dioxide  

a) Inorganic  
b) Living  
c) Inorganic  
d) Biogenic
What are the main factors that can disrupt the stability of an ecosystem, and how do they affect the biosphere?

Question:  
**Categorize the following objects into the components of the biosphere: basalt, granite, bacteria, plants, animals, fungi, soil, silt, coal, peat, chalk, oxygen, and carbon dioxide.**
